channel.title: Compile Help(error)
channel.description:
I've received the following error:
[code]The system cannot find the path specified.[/code]
How do i fix that? I know this sounds nubby >.>. I'm just new lulz.

item.title: Compile Help(error)
item.dc:creator: @Kr0nikk Kr0nikk
item.description:
@Kr0nikk wrote:

[quote=“DeathSlay, post:7, topic:346397”]ok edit on compile. open up new window to your computer. (computer file) go to
"C: (hard drive) and go down to programfiles. now some computer have programfiles and programfiles (x86)
look in both if u have both. find the folder java. and find your newest java. now to add to compile.
its wat u just did just edit the things

ex.C:\Programas\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe

"c:/ hard drive u went into that u went into/ programs (x86)/you went into java/and your latest java version

hope this helped :)[/quote]

Thank you, you did help

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Help(error)
item.dc:creator: @DeathSlay DeathSlay
item.description:
@DeathSlay wrote:

ok edit on compile. open up new window to your computer. (computer file) go to
"C: (hard drive) and go down to programfiles. now some computer have programfiles and programfiles (x86)
look in both if u have both. find the folder java. and find your newest java. now to add to compile.
its wat u just did just edit the things

ex.C:\Programas\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe

"c:/ hard drive u went into that u went into/ programs (x86)/you went into java/and your latest java version

hope this helped

Read full topic

item.title: Compile Help(error)
item.dc:creator: @Kr0nikk Kr0nikk
item.description:
@Kr0nikk wrote:

TimmahPwnz:

right click compiler and click edit then change the java path, is it like “C:/Program Files/Java” or is it Javac?

“C:\Programas\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

^^exact from compiler

Read full topic
